name: Offline DB
tagline: An offline DB demo based on AngularJS framework and HTML5 IndexedDB
body:
This is a single page application based on AngularJS framework and HTML5 IndexedDB. It manages a simple local database, to which users can add, remove, search and list in pages.

**One tip**: All the photos must be kept in photos/ directory. When you create a new slide, only images under that directory can be selected. After all, it's just a html app, isn't it?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
